ninvaders.description: Space Invaders. It's actually pretty hard you know

moon-buggy.description: Moon Buggy game in terminal. You don't wanna crash on moon, cause then there is no way back home!

nethack.description: Just like Dungeons and Dragons, but of the terminal world. It's a classic.

pacman4console.description: Console version of the popular arcade game Pac-Man.

bsdgames.description: Collection of classic text games like tetris, snake, pong, hangman, and adventure.

greed.description: A game of consumption and survival on a grid.

bastet.description: A notoriously difficult version of Tetris.

crawl.description: Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup, a fun and highly addictive roguelike game.
